# text

**Instance Property**

The list item’s primary text.

## Declaration

```swift
var text: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Siri speaks this text when the user selects the list item.

## Managing Content

- **detailText**: The list item’s secondary text.
- **trailingText**: The list item’s supplementary text.
title: text
